description: BigTransfer (BiT) is a robust image classification model that leverages transfer learning to achieve state-of-the-art performance on a variety of image classification tasks. BiT is pre-trained on a large dataset and can be fine-tuned for specific tasks, providing high accuracy and efficiency. It is designed to handle diverse datasets and is particularly effective in scenarios with limited labeled data.

metrics.inference_time: 15 ms per image on NVIDIA V100

dependencies.hardware_requirements: GPU (NVIDIA V100 or similar recommended), CPU

limitations:
- The model may require substantial computational resources for training and fine-tuning.
- Performance may vary significantly based on the quality and diversity of the fine-tuning dataset.
- Requires a GPU for optimal performance and real-time inference.
